thread.title: Condell to host 'Clean Shave Day'
thread.title_full: Condell to host 'Clean Shave Day' - DailyHerald.com

author: Daily Herald report
title: Condell to host 'Clean Shave Day'
text:
Men are being encouraged to get ready for no-shave November and support Lake County's veterans Thursday, Oct. 29, at Advocate Condell Medical Center in Libertyville. Dubbed "Clean Shave Day," the event will be from 6 to 8 a.m. at Centre Club Fitness Center, 200 W. Golf Road. Libertyville's SportClips will provide shaves with an electric trimmer for a suggested $5 donation to the Lake County Veterans and Family Services Foundation.
 News Libertyville Charities and Fundraising Lake County
